fields.name: AlertDescriptionFormat
fields.description: the format containing columns name(s) to override the alert description

fields.name: AlertDisplayNameFormat
fields.description: the format containing columns name(s) to override the alert name

fields.name: AlertDynamicProperties
fields.description: List of additional dynamic properties to override

fields.description: the column name to take the alert severity from

fields.description: the column name to take the alert tactics from
